document_data.name: The Unclean
document_data.mainbody: The '''Unclean''' was a faction within the [[Everlasting]] in [[1367 DR]].{{AQ-time}}{{cite book/Assassin Mountain/Holy Slayer Sourcebook|18}}
document_data.Base of Operations: The Unclean were based in the fortress of [[Sarahin]] located deep within the [[Haunted Lands]].
document_data.Activities: The [[sha'ir]]s of the Unclean provided the [[Marwan al-Jabal al-Hiyali|Shadow Caliph]] with a unique source of power and information given their relationship with [[genie]]s.
document_data.Members: The Unclean were led by a sha'ir named [[Akim al-Kalaas]]. The Unclean was the smallest faction of the Everlasting with only 15 members as of 1367 DR.
